name: Calhoon's Log
overview: A brain\logic game created by Fender Tucker, Robert Dallmann & Andrew Fisher and published in Loadstar #134 in 1995 and later in both Loadstar #139 and Loadstar #249. Here are brand new logic problems for you to solve with Knees Calhoon's puzzle program. A collection of 5 logic problems: Bill's Cars Karate Tests Pets Jobs Sweet Treats For these 5 problems there are 3 parts to each solution screen. The text window which shows the explanation of the problem, the logic chart where you can place Xs or periods to help you sleuth out the truth and and the answer grid where you put in the letter to the answer you are giving.
